docs.title: Home
docs.text: nav: - Section: - section/index.md - Page 1: section/page-1.md ... - Page n: section/page-n.md

docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: TCORE is designed with a modular architecture that enables high performance and scalability. The main components include the processor core, memory management unit, and pipeline structure.

docs.title: Key Components
docs.text:
• Processor Core: The core design features a RISC-V compatible architecture with optimizations for power efficiency and performance.
  • Pipeline: TCORE uses a 5-stage pipeline that allows for parallel instruction execution.
  • Memory Management Unit: Handles memory access and virtual memory support.
